name: Soundwave Surfer
description:
Surf your awesome guitar on the sound-waves as you do battle with pop-stars for the true hear of music. A score based schmup made in a month for February #1GAM with the theme of music.

Instructions:

  • Killing enemies increases score.
  • Taking damage reduces score.
  • Bullets that don't hit enemies reduces score.
  • Get the highest score and be cool.

Credits:
Art and dev: Wynand Prinsloo
